moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather SmarterMail Password Extraction
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module extracts and decrypts the sysadmin password in the
        SmarterMail 'mailConfig.xml' configuration file. The encryption
        key and IV are publicly known.

        This module has been tested successfully on SmarterMail versions
        10.7.4842 and 11.7.5136.
author: Joe Giron
bcoles <bcoles@gmail.com>
sinn3r <sinn3r@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
